questions.question: 1.  The formation of pink colour is the negative result of urease test
2. The pH indicator in urease test is :
3. When urease is produced by the organism, _______ is released and the pH of the urea slant becomes________
4.  Which one of the following statement is true:

answers.a: The urease test identifies Proteus vulgaris
answers.b: The pH indicator used in the urease test is methyl red
answers.c: SIM medium is used for urease test
